PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x7070FFHow to use^7^7 - Choose a passive tree in the bottom-left dropdown menu, and adjust your level at the top - Select one of the three gear presets or import your own gear with the Import/Export Build feature - Enable one of the three gem presets, disable the others and check "Include in Full DPS" with Arc and Orb of Storms - Configure anything relevant in the Gem and Configuration tabs
^x7070FFNotes^7 - All rare gear uses the most recommended affixes for that slot with average rolls - Gems that don't need quality or need to stay at a certain level are shown like that, all others are defaulted at 20/20 - Nothing is minmaxed, you can still get more out of the build compared to the example gear - Check the guide for Act 1-10 gem setups
^x7070FFWhat to set up in Configuration, Skills & Items^7 - Passive Tree & Level (Tree) - Gem Setups (Skills) - Gear Setup (Items) - Activate Flasks (Items) - Is the enemy a Boss? = Standard Boss or Sirus (Configuration) - Do you use Power Charges? (Configuration) - Do you have Onslaught? (Configuration) - Exposure Type = Lightning (Configuration) - Is the enemy Shocked? (Configuration) you'll consistently shock bosses for 40% - 50% - Is the enemy Unnerved? w/ Endgame or High Budget Gloves (Configuration) - Is the enemy on Consecrated Ground? w/ Bottled Faith (Configuration)
^x7070FFKnown Issues^7 - Brass Dome's "Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes" is not supported yet. This and Elemental Ailment Immunity from Purity of Elements makes the build tankier than it looks at first. - All Eldritch Implicits used by this build aren't supported yet. Lightning Exposure is simulated by Wave of Conviction, the Action Speed increase is missing in DPS calculations.
